title: Target names for only_testing/skip_testing in scan doesn't handle whitespace correctly
body:
### New Issue Checklist - [x] Updated fastlane to the latest version - [x] I read the [Contribution Guidelines](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) - [x] I read [docs.fastlane.tools](https://docs.fastlane.tools) - [x] I searched for [existing GitHub issues](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/issues) ### Issue Description I am using the scan tool in my fastfile. I want fastlane to run my unit tests, but not my ui tests, so to do that I use: run_tests(scheme: "My App", code_coverage: true, only_testing: "My App Unit Tests") This fails with the error "Unknown build action 'App'". After looking through the command that is actually being used against xcodebuild, it appears fastlane is using escape characters for white space in the scheme target, but not for white space in the only_testing/skip_testing targets. I have verified this by changing my command to run_tests(scheme: "My App", code_coverage: true, only_testing: "My\\ App\\ Unit\\ Tests"). When I use this command, it works as expected, though this is weird to deal with because it is inconsistent with other commands using app targets. ### Environment 
✅ fastlane environment ✅

### Stack

| Key                         | Value                                       |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| OS                          | 10.14.1                                     |
| Ruby                        | 2.2.4                                       |
| Bundler?                    | false                                       |
| Git                         | git version 2.17.2 (Apple Git-113)          |
| Installation Source         | ~/.fastlane/bin/bundle/bin/fastlane         |
| Host                        | Mac OS X 10.14.1 (18B75)                    |
| Ruby Lib Dir                | ~/.fastlane/bin/bundle/lib                  |
| OpenSSL Version             | OpenSSL 1.0.2g  1 Mar 2016                  |
| Is contained                | true                                        |
| Is homebrew                 | false                                       |
| Is installed via Fabric.app | false                                       |
| Xcode Path                  | /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/ |
| Xcode Version               | 10.1                                        |

| LC_ALL   | en_US.UTF-8 | ✅ |
| LANGUAGE | en_US.UTF-8 | ✅ |
